_subject: Get lucky and see Daryl Ong Concert Live in Kuwait!!
_message: ou have now entered into a lucky draw for the Daryl Ong Live Concert happening on 29th November 2019. You will get a chance to win 2 concert tickets. There are a total of 500 tickets to be won. Keep transacting and increase your chances. Announcement of the winners will be on 21st November 2019. Wishing you best of luck!
